## Embedded class

A client for interacting with an embedded Cerbos policy decision point (PDP).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Embedded extends Client 
```
**Extends:** [Client](./core.client.md)

## Remarks

Embedded PDP bundles are WebAssembly modules downloaded from [Cerbos Hub](https://www.cerbos.dev/product-cerbos-hub)<!-- -->. Bundle download URLs are available in the "Embedded" section of the "Decision points" page of your Cerbos Hub workspace.

See [the parent class](./core.client.md) for available methods.
